DOC.detailed_description: This Phase II , open label , single arm , multicenter study NK012 patient sensitive relapse SCLC ( least 90 day since first line therapy ) refractory relapse SCLC ( < 90 day since first line therapy ) . NK012 administer intravenous infusion 30 minute every 28 day ( Day 1 cycle ) . Patients screen UGT1A1 polymorphism prior enrollment .
